+1 FOR ANTIROXX SERVERS IF YOU TROLL WITH FRIENDS

    No "hacking" or cheating - 1. Permanent Ban
    No racism or prejudicial behaviour - 1. Mute; 2. Kick; 3. Hour Ban; 4. Week Ban; 5. Permanent Ban
    No casual use of racial/prejudicial names and curses in public chat - 1-2. Warning; 3. Mute; 4. Kick
    Occasional swearing is allowed but no abuse or offensive behaviour towards other players - 1. Warning; 2. Kick; 3. Hour Ban; 4. Permanent Ban
    Camping is only allowed when it is part of the map objective - 1. Warning; 2. Slap; 3. Slay; 4. Kick; 5. Hour Ban; 6. Permanent Ban
    English only - 1. Warning; 2. Mute
    No spamming the voice chat or text chat - 1. Warning; 2. Mute
    Using speakers with a mic causes feedback and is considered spamming
    Singing, humming, whistling, etc. on voice chat is considered spamming
    No whining or accusing other players of breaking the rules when they're not - 1-2. Warning; 3. Mute
    No advertising - 1. Mute
    No trolling in any other form - 1. Warning; 2. Kick; 3. Hour Ban; 4. Permanent Ban
    If you cause the server to lag you may be kicked
    If the server is full, you may be kicked to make room for VIP Members

哈哈哈CSGO买了一直没怎么玩，反而起源和零点行动玩的更多，虽然是N年前的作品了，但是可玩性依旧很强，1.6时代画质是很烂了，但condition zero同样的引擎很好的弥补了些画质问题，起源更具真实感，零点行动的可玩性更强，可惜到了起源后没了storm这张地图，真的是神图，地图里还留了一般人发现不到的作者的墓碑尸骨的彩蛋

Got this game when it was on sale, never played counter strike before and my experiance with PC FPS onlnie is limmited however I do enjoy this game its simple nature is quite addictive and is great fun with friends, I would recomend this over CS:GO because this has no microtransactions.
Only negative that i could think of are the dated graphics and the fact that as a new player to CS you will get owned alot, other than that its a great game.

After some extensive gameplay this shooter including community and professional community has evolved my life greatly and will continue to progress myself as a man friend and a leader. my gaming experience with this online shootout will forever  fall in heavy favor as the greatest learning experience in my life. my favorite first person action game to date and most definitely the #1 tool to develop my mind thicken my skin and test my limits as a ritual i continue to take part in. As many have seen the stock maps and partake in the daily grind with the usuals it is such a go get it brand with occasional complications as far as technicalities and command knowledge issues have seemed to pass as we have grown with each other into a gaming powerhouse. My main resolve for this series is  not just an in game experience more than the next two which is a general PC building and tweaking which has come down to a rough 1 hour to 1 day on a brand new PC of manipulation now that's a day after many years of daily research is now accessible as free of charge kit. To my knowledge the average skill had exploded into something great visually and the best of the best skilled players on a default maps skills have become phenomenal. As this game has been out for nearly 15 years the current technology on this engine will run at a cheap price at bleeding edge quality. The growth I admire with this famous repetitious worldwide experience will soar you over the years and blow your mind on the comparisons between counter-strike:source and any level of sports could easily be argued for some extensive dates into the future.

[i]Игра [h1]Counter-Strike: Source[/h1]-лучшая игра, которая раньше была для меня прекрасным шутером с хорошей графикой и картами. Когда я зашел на старые карты, в которые я много раз играл с ботами, даж прослезился чуток. Сразу после игры [b]Counter-Strike : Globall offensive[/b], когда я играл с другом, мы считали этот разброс рандомом, 50 на 50, непонятно было как тут работает отдача, как урон то огромный, то маленький, да и как я отвык от голосовых чатов ботов... Лично для меня игра подходит для мини-игр типа [b]Deathrun[/b], [b]Surf[/b] и другие, от которых не зависят знания в стрельбе. Мне она дала много [u]хороших воспоминаний[/u], [u]ностальгии[/u], [u]достижений[/u] и конечно же [u]CSS контент[/u] для [b]Garry's mod[/b].[/i]

After re-buying Counter-Strike Source, i realized one thing:
After all these hours on CSGO, i simply forget how to have fun.
Pros compared to CSGO:
+Can set up 16v16 matches (also apply to CS 1.6)
+Custom skins! No more paying for skins or gambling for case!
+Had several effects (i.e. physics) that are mostly removed in CSGO (possibly to avoid fluctuation to frame rate given the models in CSGO are more detailed)

Cons compared to CSGO:
-Mostly dead public server in several areas
-Scoping on battle rifle still giving the awkward "zoom in the screen" effect.
-Graphics not up to par with CSGO (DUH WHY DO YOU EVEN CARE IT IS A 2006 GAME, PLUS THERE ARE SO MUCH SKINS TO MAKE THIS GAME GREAT)

After all, if you got spare change, just spare it to feel what today's gaming mostly missing.
